mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, goods_count, warn_line, produce_time, purchase_time, purchase_staff, produce_vendor, comment from warehouse_storage where goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into warehouse_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, goods_count, warn_line, produce_time, purchase_time, purchase_staff, produce_vendor, comment) values (#{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{warnLine}, #{produceTime}, #{purchaseTime}, #{purchaseStaff}, #{produceVendor}, #{comment})

insert into warehouse_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, goods_count, warn_line, produce_time, purchase_time, purchase_staff, produce_vendor, comment) values
(#{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.warnLine}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.purchaseTime}, #{entity.purchaseStaff}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.comment})

insert into warehouse_storage(goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, goods_count, warn_line, produce_time, purchase_time, purchase_staff, produce_vendor, comment) values
(#{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.warnLine}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.purchaseTime}, #{entity.purchaseStaff}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update goods_name = values(goods_name), goods_type = values(goods_type), goods_price = values(goods_price), goods_count = values(goods_count), warn_line = values(warn_line), produce_time = values(produce_time), purchase_time = values(purchase_time), purchase_staff = values(purchase_staff), produce_vendor = values(produce_vendor), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update warehouse_storage
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice},
goods_count = #{goodsCount},
warn_line = #{warnLine},
produce_time = #{produceTime},
purchase_time = #{purchaseTime},
purchase_staff = #{purchaseStaff},
produce_vendor = #{produceVendor},
comment = #{comment},
where goods_id = #{goodsId}
